attributes.action: Force Gordon Brown to become Prime Minister again.
attributes.additional_details: Because GB is the man to guide us through the dark times of Covid-19.
attributes.background: Make Gordon Brown our Prime Minister as he saved the world in the financial crash and is the only Prime Minister who has openly stood up to bigots in society.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or appointed.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
